headline: Align Technology, Inc. (ALGN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Align Technology, Inc. (ALGN) on DIY Investor’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ALGN. Align Technology, Inc. (ALGN)’s share was trading at $188.07 as of 10th June. ALGN’s trailing and forward P/E were 32.9 and 17.7 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Align Technology (ALGN), the […]
